info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM CLUSTER WITH GUSTY WIND WILL IMPACT SOUTH CENTRAL WESTMORELAND... EAST CENTRAL GREENE...FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN MONONGALIA AND NORTH CENTRAL PRESTON COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM EDT... At 348 PM EDT, radar indicated a thunderstorm cluster centered near Point Marion, or 9 miles southwest of Uniontown, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Uniontown, Connellsville, Scottdale, Masontown, South Connellsville, Farmington, Fairdale, Seven Springs, Fairchance, Dunbar, Smithfield, and Everson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 68 in West Virginia between mile markers 20 and 22. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 89 and 94, and between mile markers 97 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
